General.Name: Anhui Sunhere Pharmaceutical Excipients Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Sunhere Pharmaceutical Excipients Co.,Ltd. research and development, production, and sale of new pharmaceutical excipients in China. The company provides cellulose, starch, povidone, stearic acid, coating powder, resin, food additive, and other products. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Huainan, China.
General.Address: Eco & Tech Dev Zn, Huainan, China, 232007
